room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Audition" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
review: Had the best time tonight trying to escape the magician's room. Staff was super friendly and it was a great experience. Can't wait to come back and try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Audition" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
review: This place is great! It was our first time doing an escape room and we had no idea what to expect. As our luck would have it, we picked the most difficult room of course. Yes it was very difficult but the clues really helped! The staff was very friendly and helpful. We had a great time and would definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Audition" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
review: This was our first time and we chose the hardest room, which is the Haunted Audition. Almost made it. I think we should have tried an easier room first... just to get the hang of it. Really fun evening though and I would go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Audition" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
review: Fantastic time! Took our 10 and 11-year-old kids to the magician's room and had a blast. Wonderful staff and very helpful towards the kids. Can't wait to try again!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Audition" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
review: This was my second visit here. This time we did the magicians room. And we made it out! Everyone is polite ans very helpful. My friend who was there was a little nervous and they patiently helped her feel comfortable. I want to try the Serial Killer room next.
